task.title: How to Create Vanilla Ice Cream
task.shortdesc: This recipe will show you how to make a simple, yet delicious vanilla ice cream

prereq.p: And if machine is not working properly, refer to:
Makes 7 cups of ice cream, purer vanilla extract will create a stronger vanilla taste

step.cmd: Start and prepare the ice cream machine
Pour 1½ cups of milk, 1 cup plus 2 tablespoons of granulated sugar, and a pinch of table salt into the bowl
Pour 3 cups of heavy cream and 1½ tablespoons of pure vanilla extract into the bowl
Take out bowl and set it near you
Press the ice cream button on the ice cream maker’s control panel
Press the start button on the machine and the arm will stir
Pour the mixture from the bowl into the ingredients spout
Cover the spout with a measuring cup
Wait 15-40 minutes depending on amount of ice cream created and thickness desired
Wait 15 minutes for ice cream to settle
Scoop out of freezer bowl and enjoy
